test_cases.description: Successfully create a new task with valid fields and location 'ames'.
test_cases.name: create_task_with_all_fields_location_ames

test_setup.given: A valid user and all required fields.
test_setup.then: Task is created. Response is 201 with task details.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called with valid data and location 'ames'.

test_cases.description: Successfully create a new task with valid fields and location 'boone'.
test_cases.name: create_task_with_all_fields_location_boone

test_setup.given: A valid user and all required fields.
test_setup.then: Task is created. Response is 201 with task details.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called with valid data and location 'boone'.

test_cases.description: Fail to create a task with an unsupported location value.
test_cases.name: create_task_with_invalid_location

test_setup.then: Task is rejected. Response is 400 with error message.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called with location 'desmoines'.

test_cases.description: Fail to create a task with an empty string for 'title'.
test_cases.name: create_task_with_empty_title

test_setup.given: All fields present but title is an empty string.
test_setup.then: Task is rejected. Response is 400 with error message.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called with empty 'title'.

test_cases.description: Successfully create a task with 'priority' as a numeric string.
test_cases.name: create_task_priority_as_string_number

test_setup.given: All fields present, priority is a string representing a number.
test_setup.then: Task is created. Response is 201 with task details.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called with priority '1' as string.

test_cases.description: Successfully create a task with 'priority' as integer.
test_cases.name: create_task_priority_as_integer

test_setup.given: All fields present, priority is integer.
test_setup.then: Task is created. Response is 201 with task details.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called with priority 3 as integer.

test_cases.description: Successfully create a task with due_date in ISO 8601 format.
test_cases.name: create_task_due_date_iso8601

test_setup.given: All fields present, due_date in ISO 8601.
test_setup.then: Task is created. Response is 201 with task details.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called.

test_cases.description: Fail to create a task with an invalid due_date format.
test_cases.name: create_task_due_date_invalid_format

test_setup.then: Task is rejected. Response is 400 with error message.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called.

test_cases.description: Fail to create a task with location 'Ames' (case sensitivity test).
test_cases.name: create_task_location_case_sensitivity

test_setup.given: All fields present, location in wrong case.
test_setup.then: Task is rejected. Response is 400 with error message.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called with location 'Ames'.

test_cases.description: Create a task with an extra field in the request. Extra fields should be ignored.
test_cases.name: create_task_with_additional_field

test_setup.given: Request includes an additional, unexpected field.
test_setup.then: Task is created. Extra field is ignored in response.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called.

test_cases.description: Create a task with a very long title (e.g., 255 chars).
test_cases.name: create_task_with_large_title

test_setup.given: All fields present, title is 255 characters.
test_setup.then: Task is created successfully.
test_setup.when: POST /tasks is called.

test_cases.description: Test successful creation of a task when all required fields are provided with valid values.
test_cases.name: CreateTask_SuccessWithAllFields

test_setup.given: No pre-existing task with the same details.
test_setup.then: The task is created and a 201 response is returned with task details.
test_setup.when: A POST request with all required fields is sent.

test_cases.description: Test failure when creating a task with missing 'title' field.
test_cases.name: CreateTask_FailMissingTitle

test_setup.then: The API returns a 400 error indicating the missing field.
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent without the 'title' field.

test_cases.description: Test failure when creating a task with missing 'description' field.
test_cases.name: CreateTask_FailMissingDescription

test_setup.then: The API returns a 400 error indicating the missing field.
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent without the 'description' field.

test_cases.description: Test failure when creating a task with missing 'priority' field.
test_cases.name: CreateTask_FailMissingPriority

test_setup.then: The API returns a 400 error indicating the missing field.
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent without the 'priority' field.

test_cases.description: Test failure when creating a task with missing 'due_date' field.
test_cases.name: CreateTask_FailMissingDueDate

test_setup.then: The API returns a 400 error indicating the missing field.
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent without the 'due_date' field.

test_cases.description: Test failure when creating a task with missing 'user_name' field.
test_cases.name: CreateTask_FailMissingUserName

test_setup.then: The API returns a 400 error indicating the missing field.
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent without the 'user_name' field.

test_cases.description: Test failure when creating a task with an empty string for 'title'.
test_cases.name: CreateTask_FailEmptyTitle

test_setup.then: The API returns a 400 error indicating the field cannot be empty.
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent with an empty 'title'.

test_cases.description: Test failure when 'due_date' is not in an acceptable date format.
test_cases.name: CreateTask_FailInvalidDueDateFormat

response_body_json.error: Field 'due_date' has invalid format. Expected YYYY-MM-DD.

test_setup.then: The API returns a 400 error indicating the invalid date format.
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent with an invalid 'due_date' format.

test_cases.description: Test successful creation when 'priority' is provided as an integer instead of a string.
test_cases.name: CreateTask_SuccessPriorityAsInteger

test_setup.then: The task is created and a 201 response is returned.
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent with 'priority' as an integer.

test_cases.description: Test failure when 'priority' is provided as an unsupported type (e.g., array).
test_cases.name: CreateTask_FailPriorityInvalidType

response_body_json.error: Field 'priority' must be a string or integer

test_setup.then: The API returns a 400 error indicating invalid type.
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent with 'priority' as an array.

test_cases.description: Test successful creation when 'title' is at its maximum allowed length (255 characters).
test_cases.name: CreateTask_SuccessTitleMaxLength

test_setup.then: The task is created and a 201 response is returned.
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent with 'title' at the maximum allowed length.

test_cases.description: Test failure when 'title' exceeds maximum allowed length (256 characters).
test_cases.name: CreateTask_FailTitleOverMaxLength

response_body_json.error: Field 'title' exceeds maximum length of 255 characters

test_setup.then: The API returns a 400 error for exceeding maximum length.
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent with 'title' exceeding maximum length.

test_cases.description: Test failure when 'due_date' is set in the past.
test_cases.name: CreateTask_FailPastDueDate

response_body_json.error: Field 'due_date' cannot be in the past

test_setup.then: The API returns a 400 error for past due date.
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent with a past 'due_date'.

test_cases.description: Test successful creation when an extra, unexpected field is present in the request body. Extra fields should be ignored.
test_cases.name: CreateTask_ExtraFieldIgnored

test_setup.then: The task is created, the extra field is ignored, and a 201 response is returned.
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent with all required fields and an extra field.

test_cases.description: Test failure when the request body contains invalid JSON.
test_cases.name: CreateTask_FailInvalidJSON

test_setup.then: The API returns a 400 error for invalid JSON.
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent with malformed JSON.
